message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to own this incredible product.  Given its unique value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,600,000.  I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth. What do you think?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only willing to pay up to $1,500,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value.  To make this work, I'm willing to come down to $1,550,000. This is my best offer, as I believe it represents a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering our positions, I would like to propose a price of $1,525,000 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise while staying within my budget constraints.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  However, I can't go any lower than $1,540,000. This is truly my final offer, as I need to factor in the true value of this product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the value and our previous negotiations, I would like to propose a price of $1,530,000 for the product. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
